===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# a [[certain]], [[particular]] (person or thing)
#: {{zh-x|某 年 某 月 某 日|on day '''x''', month '''y''' of year '''z'''}}

# {{lb|zh|humble|by itself}} [[I]]
# {{n-g|Used in place of a person's given name, for anonymity purposes.}}
#: {{zh-x|^張 ^某|a person with the surname of Zhang}}
# {{n-g|Used in place of someone else's given name, to show dissatisfaction.}}
# {{n-g|Used in place of one's own given name, to refer to oneself with an intensified emotion.}}
